column3: You <Emphasis>have</Emphasis> heard of the Brugaire Consortium, I trust? We are one of the largest merchant outfitters in the entire city–state of Limsa Lominsa, and deal in an extensive range of wares including weapons, perishables, and fashionable apparel.
I have but recently been appointed chief assistant to Vice-chairman Bango Zango. Ah, brokering deals and negotiating trade contracts...it is my calling in life.
Can I have another pair of shoes?
What's this? Are you struggling to tell me you have <Emphasis>lost</Emphasis> the fine pair of shoes I chose <Emphasis>especially</Emphasis> for you?
Fortunately, I have another such pair available. You may have them out of the kindness of my heart...and the loathing in my soul I bear for your usual “attire.”
